flawed_nl_solution:
After one year he earns $200 in interest because 1000 x 0.2 = <<1000*0.2=200>>200
After one year it has $1,200 in the account because 1000 + 200 = <<1000+200=12000>>12000
He takes out $600 because 12000 / 2 = <<12000/2=6000>>6000
After this it has $600 in it because 12000 - 6000 = <<12000-6000=6000>>6000
She earns $90 in interest because 6000 x 0.15 = <<6000*0.15=900>>900
The account now has $6900 because 6000 + 900 = <<6000+900=6900>>6900
#### 6900

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 12000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
